channel.title: Vacuum Cleaner on Alexander Bulimov: Production Engineer and Scale Modeller
channel.description: Recent content in Vacuum Cleaner on Alexander Bulimov: Production Engineer and Scale Modeller

item.title: Robot Vacuum Cleaner is an amazing invention
item.description: I have been using a robot vacuum cleaner for exactly one year now, so decided to summarize my thoughts. Generally I’m not a fan of all this ‘smart home’ stuff, definitely very far from being a fanboy by all standards. But at the same time I’m a huge fan of automating everything, and thus was always interested in trying a robot vacuum cleaner. If anything, washing machine and a dishwasher already immensely help with other house chores, why not automate cleaning too?
